title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
General Considerations

For Task A, the response must correctly describe the role of Congress in the context of the scenario.

For Task B, the response must correctly explain how the role of Congress described in Part A may affect state priorities.

For Task C, the response must explain how the type of grant used to fund the proposal could affect the scenario.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the Tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the Tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
